scripts.preinstall: if [ "$CI" != true ]; then cat Brewfile; echo; echo; read -p "Install/update Brewfile dependencies as shown above (y/N)?" -n 1 -r; echo; if [ "$REPLY" == "y" ]; then brew bundle check || brew bundle install; fi; fi
scripts.postinstall: if [ "$CI" != true ]; then pre-commit install --install-hooks --overwrite; fi
scripts.detect-secrets: git ls-files -z | xargs -0 detect-secrets-hook --verbose --baseline .secrets.baseline # pragma: allowlist-secret
scripts.build:app:shared: cd projects/app && rm -rf dist && cp -r ./src ./dist && find dist -type f ! -name '*.njk' -print0 | xargs -0 rm -f && cp -r ./src/static dist && sass dist/static/shared-cache/application.scss dist/static/shared-cache/application.css --no-source-map && rm dist/static/shared-cache/application.scss && csso dist/static/shared-cache/application.css --output dist/static/shared-cache/application.css
scripts.build:app: npm run build:app:shared && cd projects/app && rolldown -c rolldown.config.ts && cp ./Makefile dist && cp ../../package.json ./dist/package.json
scripts.build-local:app: npm run build:app:shared && cd projects/app && rolldown -c rolldown.local.config.ts
scripts.run:app: npm run build-local:app && concurrently 'npm run watch:app' 'cd projects/app && node --watch ./dist/local.js' --kill-others
scripts.generate-openapi:app: export $(cat projects/app/.env.openapi | xargs); cd projects/app && rm -rf dist_openapi && tsc && fastify generate-swagger --yaml=true dist_openapi/src/app.js > openapi.yaml
scripts.check-openapi:app: export $(cat projects/app/.env.openapi | xargs); cd projects/app && rm -rf dist_openapi && tsc && fastify generate-swagger --yaml=true dist_openapi/src/app.js > openapi_check.yaml && cmp -s openapi.yaml openapi_check.yaml && spectral lint openapi.yaml
